turn_speed.description: Turn speed in degrees per second. Use zero for animation driven rotation.

acceleration.description: Acceleration of turn speed in degrees. 0 (or negative) means instant acceleration.

deceleration.description: Deceleration of turn speed in degrees. 0 (or negative) means instant deceleration.

quad_distance_right.description: The distance from the root to the right edge of the alignment quad (if using AlignStrategy_QuadGround)

quad_distance_forward.description: The distance from the root to the forward edge of the alignment quad (if using AlignStrategy_QuadGround)

quad_distance_back.description: If this is 0, it will use the value of quad_distance_forward. The distance from the root to the back edge of the alignment quad (if using AlignStrategy_QuadGround)

foot_ray_distance.description: The distance of the raycast to check how far above ground the feets are. Only used if feet_pivots is set.

supression_strength.description: The supression strength that pushes a foot up from the ground.

feet_pivots.description: The feets that make up the quad that is aligned to ground (if using AlignStrategy_WalkerGround).

feet_extras.description: Extra feets that also gets the animation variable for distance above ground, but take no part in alignment.

height_adjust_node.description: [string]MUST HAVE ANIM DISABLED IN SKELETON, Node to use when adjusting body height over ground to make sure feet touch the ground

foot_extension_max.description: How far a leg can be extended

foot_extension_min.description: How far a leg can be contracted

can_fall.description: [bool]True if the entity can fall or always will try to stick to the walls (if using AlignStrategy_QuadGround).

always_check_against_terrain.description: [bool]Always do second check to see if we are below terrain

alignment_limits.description: Limits to roll and pitch when in AlignStrategy_QuadGround, AlignStrategy_WalkerGround and AlignStrategy_WalkerVertical.

anim_variable_turn_speed.description: [string]Animation variable to send for turn speed. This will only work for AlignStrategy_Ground and AlignStrategy_Vertical

anim_variable_turn_speed_max.description: The maximum/minimum value that will be sent to the turn speed animation variable. Will be used to clamp between -max and +max.
